    üóÇÔ∏è What Project I Worked On:

There were various things to do like to get the mp3 audio of the pronunciation of the word, word‚Äôs meaning when used as noun, verb and adjective. I have to take care of lot of things. Also I added a thing which was not in the project was to show a message if there is no audio pronunciation available for a word.

    üí™ What Challenges I Faced:

So literally opened different tabs in browser and I analysed the object which I was getting from 5-6 different words then I got to know which data or element to target. Everything else was good.
